name: Launching "The Numpties" Game
blurb: The Numpties is the next generation of educational gaming; visually stunning, creative content & real education

rewards.reward: Pre-launch access to the Numptyville Game & Exclusive Funders Blog that will give you updates on how we are progressing with the project.  You will get access to the game 3 months before we make it available to the public.

You will get 3 copies of the game to share with your friends and a high resolution Numpties wallpaper. Again, all of these will be made available 3 months before public. Plus all the previous reward tiers.

Be part of our closed beta community. We will be launching a beta community portal where we will gather all your feedback, take your opinions on design, playability and educational content to build a better game for you and future players. We'll also give you two more game copies with beta invites for two friends. Plus all the previous reward tiers.

A super cool branded Numpties T-Shirt. The front of the shirt will show the Numpties logo and the back will be the main picture of Numptyville (available in adult and children sizes).  Plus all the previous reward tiers.

Make it forever with a Lifetime Partnership.  We plan for Numptyville to be the first step of our journey, and we would like you to be there with us for the long run. We will give you all the products we will ever make for free and before publicly available.  First in the plan are 4 more Numpties games this year, and then we will launch Creative & Educational iBooks. Plus all the previous reward tiers.

Numptyville Journey poster. We will produce a high quality poster print with graphics from the game, pictures of the team and quotes form our beta community that bring the journey of launching Numptyville to life.  Plus all the previous reward tiers.

Be part of our design team.  Numptyville and the surrounding worlds will be made up of quirky and creative elements from the houses, landmarks, and characters.  You will be able to submit your design for one of these elements, it will make it into the game for everyone to see, you will get credited as part of our design team and we will design for you a custom poster with the design. Plus all the previous reward tiers.

VIP Guest at the "Numptyville" launch party.  We are a really fun and diverse team: an American, a few English, an Austrian, some Spaniards and many other international supporting cast members and we would love for you to be part of it.  You'll join us for a pre-party team dinner and then on to the big party where friends and family will join us to celebrate the launch of Numptyville.  Plus all the previous reward tiers.

Join the Numpties team!  Are you creative and passionate?  We would love your ideas and suggestions to help make Numptiville truly great.  Come join us in London for a 4 week internship (flight/living expenses will need to be covered by the backer).  You will work with the team on a daily basis, you will help us successfully launch "Numptyville", you get a great life experience, credited as a team member on the game and start-up experience for your resume.   Plus all the previous reward tiers.

Create your very own Numpties game!  You will join us in London (or remotely) and be lead creative on one of our next Numpties games.  This will include creating a new world concept where one of the Lost Numpties will live, designing the main character of the world and defining the challenge that will need to be overcome by the players.  You will work hand in hand with our Games Producer, you will have the full support of our creative team, educators and testers (travel expenses to be covered by backer).  Plus all the previous reward tiers.
